name: Treasure of the Phoenix
overview: Fly through the massive tomb of King Tut on your powerful Eagle. The first chamber you must pass through contains many magical hazards including spears of death, bewitched saws, and horrendous boulders. The second chamber contains minions of the Devil. If you get past these and reach the door you will arrive in a different part of the tomb. The third chamber has never been seen by mortal eyes but it is rumored that a phoenix guards it at all times.
